Description: Glazed composition shabti of Psamtek born of Nitiiriu with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs, the back-pillar is similarly inscribed, there is a plinth beneath the feet.
